text: Gorka Gerrikagoitia Arrien (born 7 December 1973 in Guernica) is a Spanish former professional cyclist who spent his entire career on . ==Palmares== ;1997 :1st Clásica Memorial Txuma ;2003 :3rd Prueba Villafranca de Ordizia :6th Clasica San Sebastian Grand Tour general classification results timeline {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2000 ! scope="col" | 2001 ! scope="col" | 2002 ! scope="col" | 2003 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España | style="text-align:center;"|66 | style="text-align:center;"|101 | style="text-align:center;"|107 | style="text-align:center;"|DNF |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
